Bitcoin tx fees relative to block subsidy increased from 1% to over 5%, helped by the subsidy halving. https://oxt.me/charts pic.twitter.com/HvUzPpthIJ

Unsurprisingly, as per-transaction fee rates rose this year, so did total fee revenue collected by bitcoin miners. https://blockchain.info/charts/transaction-fees-usd?daysAverageString=7 …pic.twitter.com/F5zTfFaQwj

Median bitcoin transaction confirmation time is on the rise this year, from ~7 minutes to over 10 minutes. https://blockchain.info/charts/median-confirmation-time?daysAverageString=7 …pic.twitter.com/n6ZEp8OQ2G
Bitcoin Core's txn fee rate estimate to get confirmed in next 3 blocks rose 557% from 14 to 78 satoshis/byte. That's 1,013% in USD terms.pic.twitter.com/2kN71hH2Cl

Bitcoin transactions per second crept up throughout 2016 from ~2 TX/S to ~3.3 TX/S https://statoshi.info/dashboard/db/transactions?panelId=6&fullscreen&from=1451705918931&to=1481946039014 …pic.twitter.com/O0HXHVDUDg
Reachable Bitcoin node count held steady in 2016; nodes reachable via TOR more than doubled. https://bitnodes.21.co/dashboard/?days=365 …pic.twitter.com/eIkfLD3dDp
